ABOUT US

USING TECHNOLOGY TO CHANGE BANKING AND BEYOND

Artis Stanbic Holdings was founded with an understanding that technology can and will change banking. In 2017, we began redefining how tech works in banking so we could move fully to the cloud. Today, we’re using machine learning, open source, and cloud technology to develop tools that help us prevent fraud, make banking simpler, and better manage the cloud.

Our Services

We help you see the world differently, discover opportunities you may never have imagined and achieve results that bridge what is with what can be.

Online Deposit

Explore the power of simpler and smarter banking. Bank online with over 250 services. Explore the power of simpler and smarter banking.

Personal Loan

Whether you want to do some home improvements, or turn existing debts into one easy monthly payment, a personal loan could be the boost you need.

Private Banking

Every service you’d expect from a premium bank and more. Make the most of your finances with our range of instant access, ISA, and fixed-term deposits.

Easy savings accounts

Want to save but don’t fancy locking your money away for a year or more? One of our easy access savings accounts could be just what you’re after.

Investing made easy

We have a range of investment options to suit different levels of experience. Our specialists can manage your investment for you.

Get Notified for the Latest News

Advancing a culture of belonging where everyone can thrive

Business Resource Groups (BRGs) play a central role in advancing diversity, inclusion and belonging at Artis stanbic Holdings. They deepen our understanding of different cultures, people and experiences, and empower associates to expand their networks and accelerate their growth and development.

Internet Banking

The Service You Deserve

Being a member of a Artis Stanbic Holdings is not like opening an account at the usual bank. You have a voice in what and how the organization is run.
